title: Legal Abortions Fell Around 6 Percent in Two Months After End of Roe
description: New data shows that the number of abortions fell by more than 10,000.
dc:creator: Margot Sanger-Katz and Claire Cain Miller
category: Dobbs v Jackson Women's Health Organization (Supreme Court Decision)
media:description: A volunteer with Midwest Access Coalition driving from St. Louis over the state border to Illinois this summer. Abortion is now banned in Missouri, but volunteers help drive women across the Mississippi River to Illinois, where it remains legal.
